title: Gtasks-Mcp
description: This MCP server integrates with Google Tasks, enabling operations like listing, searching, creating, updating, and deleting tasks via its tools and resources.
creator: zcaceres

GOOGLE_TASKS_API_SCOPES.description: Google Tasks API scopes required for authentication.

GCP_OAUTH_KEYS_FILE.description: Path to the JSON file containing OAuth client keys.
